history.narrative: Law 17-390, the “Title 22 Amendment Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-627 which was referred to the Committee on Public Safety and the Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 15, 2008, and September 16, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 1, 2009, it was assigned Act No. 17-524 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-390 became effective on May 15, 2009.
